summary: Two homies, Smokey and Craig Jones, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the two hundred dollars they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.
cast: Ice Cube|Chris Tucker|Nia Long|Tom Lister Jr.|John Witherspoon|Anna Maria Horsford|Regina King|Paula Jai Parker|Faizon Love|DJ Pooh|Angela Means|Vickilyn Reynolds|Ronn Riser|Kathleen Bradley|Tony Cox|Anthony Johnson|Demetrius Navarro|Jason Bose Smith|Bernie Mac|Justin Revoner|Meagan Good|LaWanda Page|Terri J. Vaughn|F. Gary Gray|Yvette Wilson|WC|Reynaldo Rey|Michael Clarke Duncan|Phil Proctor
title: Friday
